#text=Last summer , I got to visit my grandma in Seattle !
#text=I took a train to visit her .
#text=In advance , I called the train station to see when the trains would be going to Seattle and how much the tickets would cost .
#text=I chose a day and arrived at the train station 1 hour before my train was scheduled to leave .
#text=There was a ticket counter in the station .
#text=I walked up the counter and bought my ticket from a lady behind the counter .
#text=After I got my ticket , I needed to wait for the train to board passengers .
#text=I sat on a big wooden bench inside the train station .
#text=When it was time to get on the train , the doors opened and a ticketperson took each of our tickets as we got on the train .
#text=I choose a window seat and put my bags in the compartment nearby .
#text=Partway through the ride , a train employee came by with snacks and drinks .
#text=I looked out the window and read a book .
#text=When we arrived in Seattle , I grabbed my bags from the baggage compartment , exited the train , and hugged my waiting grandma !
